import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../../service/User/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-add-waiter', templateUrl: './admin-add-waiter.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-add-waiter.component.css'] }) export class AdminAddWaiterComponent { waiter = { name: '', surname: '', email: '', restaurantId: '' }; constructor(private adminService: UserService) { } onSubmit(): void { } resetForm(): void { this.waiter = { name: '', surname: '', email: '', restaurantId: '' }; } }
